title: Health begins at home
creator_credit: Ivan Ivanov-Vano, WHO and Soluzmultfilm, Moscow
brief_description: Animated film on public health and health education. The spirit of sickness decides to concentrate on a house where a family lives happily and healthily. After much effort the “spirit” manages to install himself but with the help of the medical services the family finally evicts the evil “spirit” and returns to normal life. The spirit seeks other homes where he may inflict disease and misery but the health services are busy protecting the people.
